com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.compute

Interface ComputeProvider<R extends ComputeInstance<T>,T extends ComputeInstanceTemplate>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - type of the instance created by this compute provider
    T - type of the template needed to create an instance
    All Superinterfaces:
    InstanceProvider<R,T>, ResourceProvider<R,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComputeProvider

    public interface ComputeProvider<R extends ComputeInstance<T>,T extends ComputeInstanceTemplate>
extends InstanceProvider<R,T>
    Represents a provider of compute instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Set<String>> getHostKeyFingerprints(T template, Collection<String> instanceIds)
      Returns a map from instance identifiers to a set of host key fingerprints for the specified instances.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider.InstanceProvider

        getInstanceState

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider.ResourceProvider

        allocate, createResourceTemplate, delete, find, getLocalizationContext, getProviderMetadata, getResourceTemplateLocalizationContext, getResourceType, validateResourceTemplateConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • getHostKeyFingerprints

        Map<String,Set<String>> getHostKeyFingerprints(T template,
                                               Collection<String> instanceIds)
                                        throws InterruptedException
        Returns a map from instance identifiers to a set of host key fingerprints for the specified instances. The implementation can return an empty map to indicate that it cannot find the host key fingerprints or that it does not support retrieving host key fingerprints. In that case Director may use other means of host key fingerprint retrieval or may skip host key verification. It may also return a partial map for the fingerprints that it managed to find.
        Parameters:
        template - the resource template used to create the instance
        instanceIds - the unique identifiers for the instances
        Returns:
        the map from instance identifiers to host key fingerprints for each instance
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted
